by.horant.fintask.service

Interface OrderService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OrderServiceImpl

    public interface OrderService
    The user of this interface undertakes to implement the service part of the interaction with the order. It includes such opportunities (methods) as checking the availability of all necessary prescriptions for drugs included in this order, removing drugs from an order, removing drugs without the necessary prescriptions for purchasing them, deleting a prescription for the appropriate drug, adding an order to the database and completing an order.
    Author:
    Anton Horbach

    • Method Detail

      • checkRecipes

        java.util.List<Medicine> checkRecipes(Order order)
                               throws ServiceException
        Checks the availability of all necessary prescriptions for drugs included in this order
        Parameters:
        order - which we check for all required recipes.
        Returns:
        a collection of drugs without the appropriate recipes in the order. If all recipes are present, returns an empty collection.
        Throws:
        ServiceException

      • deleteMedicine

        void deleteMedicine(java.util.List<Medicine> orderedMedicine,
                    int deletedMedicineId)
        Removes drugs from an order.
        Parameters:
        orderedMedicine - the list from which you want to remove the medicine.
        deletedMedicineId - id medicine that we want to remove.

      • deleteMedicinesWithoutPrescription

        void deleteMedicinesWithoutPrescription(java.util.List<Medicine> medicinesWithoutPrescription,
                                        Order order)
        Removes drugs without the necessary prescriptions for purchasing them.
        Parameters:
        medicinesWithoutPrescription - list containing medicines without the necessary prescriptions
        order - order from which you need to remove drugs without the necessary prescriptions

      • deleteMedicinesPrescription

        void deleteMedicinesPrescription(java.util.List<Prescription> prescriptions,
                                 int deletedMedicineId)
        Removes a prescription for the appropriate drug.
        Parameters:
        prescriptions - the recipe list from which we want to delete the recipe.
        deletedMedicineId - id prescription that we want to remove.

      • addOrder

        boolean addOrder(User user,
                 Order order)
          throws ServiceException
        Adds an order to the database
        Parameters:
        user - user in whose name the order is issued.
        order - the order we want to add.
        Returns:
        true - if order was added, false - if order wasn't added.
        Throws:
        ServiceException

      • completeOrder

        boolean completeOrder(int orderId)
               throws ServiceException
        Completes order.
        Parameters:
        orderId - order id that we want to add.
        Returns:
        true - if order was completed, false - if order wasn't completed.
        Throws:
        ServiceException
